summary: AN ORDINANCE authorizing the Mayor to execute an agreement with the Municipality of Metropolitan Seattle (Metro) for reimbursement of City of Seattle costs for design review of the Renton Effluent Transfer System project and payment to Metro for designing a water distribution feeder for the City of Seattle; authorizing the acceptance of funds when received; authorizing the hiring of consultants; making appropriations from the Engineering Department Operating Fund and the Emergency Fund; and declaring the emergency therefor.
